titles.title: Mental Health Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2025
Mental Health Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2025

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make loans and loan guarantees for planning, constructing, or renovating pediatric or adult mental health treatment facilities and pediatric or adult substance use disorder treatment facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
